full_script: Introductory visual for A cat talking about its eyes and ears. You think you have privacy in this house? That's cute. I know when you wake up when you go to bed and how often you pee. Visual representation of: I know you eat snacks at midnight and pretend it d... I know you eat snacks at midnight and pretend it didn't happen. I see the way you talk to your plants. Concluding visual for A cat talking about its eyes and ears. I hear your cringe-voice memos before you delete them. I am always watching silently from a shelf, or a doorway, or the top of the fridge like a judgemental gargoyle. I don't judge out loud, but I do absorb everything. So when I stare at you with dead pan eyes, just know I have seen things.

segments.content: Introductory visual for A cat talking about its eyes and ears.
You think you have privacy in this house? That's cute. I know when you wake up when you go to bed and how often you pee.
Visual representation of: I know you eat snacks at midnight and pretend it d...
I know you eat snacks at midnight and pretend it didn't happen. I see the way you talk to your plants.
Concluding visual for A cat talking about its eyes and ears.

I hear your cringe-voice memos before you delete them. I am always watching silently from a shelf, or a doorway, or the top of the fridge like a judgemental gargoyle. I don't judge out loud, but I do absorb everything.
So when I stare at you with dead pan eyes, just know I have seen things.

theme: A cat talking about its eyes and ears.
